section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.message: Welcome to FadeFlow! By using our platform,you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms of use. Please read them carefully.

section2.title: 2. Barber Responsibilities
section2.message: As a barber, you are responsible for providing professional and courteous services to your clients. You agree to honor all bookings made through our app and to maintain the highest tandards of hygiene and safety.

section3.title: 3. Booking and Cancellation
section3.message: You must manage your availability accurately in the app. Any cancellations should be done in a timely manner, and you must notify your clients immediately if you are unable to fulfill a booking.

section4.title: 4. Payment and Refunds
section4.message: All payments are final and non-refundable. If a client cancels a booking, you will be responsible for refunding the client's payment. If payment is collected in cash at the store, then previous statament do not apply

section5.title: 5. Privacy and Data Protection
section5.message: Your privacy is important to us. We value your privacy and will not share your personal information with any third parties without your consent.

section6.title: 6. Account Termination
section6.message: We reserve the right to terminate your account at any time if you fail to comply with these terms or engage in behavior detrimental to the platform or its users.

section7.title: 7. Modifications to the Terms
section7.message: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. If we make any significant changes, we will notify you by email or through the app, and continued use of the app constitutes your acceptance of the new terms

section8.title: 8. Contact Information
section8.message: If you have any questions or concerns about these terms, please contact us at {{email}}

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.message: This Privacy Policy outlines how {{name}} collects, uses, and protects your personal information. By using our app, you consent to the data practices described in this policy.

section2.title: 2. Information Collection
section2.message: We collect personal information such as your name, email address, and phone number when you sign up for an account or use our app.

section3.title: 3. Information Usage
section3.message: We use your personal information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and personalize your experience.

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section4.message: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.message: We implement security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.  However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure.

section6.title: 6. Changes to Privacy Policy
section6.message: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. If we make any significant changes, we will notify you by email or through the app, and continued use of the app constitutes your acceptance of the new policy.

section7.title: 7. Account Termination
section7.message: If you wish to terminate your account, you can do so by contacting us at {{email}} or by going to your profile section within the app. Please note that we may retain some information for audit purposes, and it is your responsibility to delete or disable your account after termination.

section8.title: 8. Contact Information
section8.message: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us at {{email}}
